text: For in vivo virus replication experiments , mice were infected with WNV and euthanized at specific days post - infection , as indicated . For tissue collection , mice were deeply anesthetized with ketamine / xylazine / acepromazine , blood collected in serum separator tubes , then transcardially perfused with sterile Dulbecco ' s phosphate - buffered saline ( dPBS ; Gibco ) . The spleen and kidneys were collected , then the brain and spinal cord removed and microdissected . All organs were snap frozen , weighed , and then homogenized in dPBS . Virus was titered by standard plaque assay with BHK21 cells , as described previously [ 46 ] . Serum viremia was measured using TaqMan quantitative RT - PCR ( qRT - PCR ) primers and probe listed in Table 1 , as described previously [ 47 ] .
